title: Most kills in a bots game

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: I just played a bots game for my daily win after a day of bad internet connection lol, and I got 106 kills in a 22 and a half minute beginner bots game as Jayce. It got me thinking, how many kills have people gotten in that kind of time frame and what is the highest someone has gotten? Post examples please cause im interested in who would be the best champ for it :D

replies.body: the best part about the match history: wards placed 1 (by jayce)
haha yeah i tp'd to it.
i got a mulitkill of 8 in a bot game.

I'm impressed actually, I can't even get 30+ assists as supports before the game ends...

Everyone keeps pushing >_>
Though it isn't what you asked, 5 pentas as Fiora in like 20 minutes.

pretty solid as fiora being melee , i personally use adcs, get fed enough for a hurricane, botrk and bloodthirster, and i go stand between the nexus and their base pad, you literally spawn kill pentas every 30 seconds
i mean it is until you start questioning wtf ur doing with your life spawn killing bots for 30 minutes, but then again, could be worse, you could be a bot... right?
To be honest, I question what I am doing with my life whenever I play bots!
Wow nice, I'm very impressed, as a fizz i can imagine you would have issues of going oom and run out of health due to no lifesteal

mind you you would literally run ghost/tele because you wouldnt need to flash away or waste ignite on a beginner bot

you could smash bot lane, then tp top for a double, go kill mid and repeat, at about 10 mins you could trinket their base and then spawn kill all 5 of them haha

That would probably work, but my strat was to do as much as i could bot lane, then recall back to base and get tear and sword of the occult, then tp back and keep snowballing without applying too much pressure until i was about 10 kills in, then push and get into their base, camping them on spawn, then recall, buy, and tp back in. killing them as they come out of base until the team ends the game. Which took 22 and a half minutes for me

my personal favourite in bots is actually miss fortune, with full move speed runes (because who needs dmg runes) her passive topped off with those runes and mobility boots is so boss, i dont even cs i just run from lane to lane slaying filthy bots :D!
I never thought of her! yeah i can imagine she would do as well as vayne, ive hit about 65 kills as vayne. i'll give her a try next time i can't get my daily win. thanks for the idea

OMG!
So many kills...
Why you have compulsion to kill?!

Haha well you see I've tried a few times in the past to find a champ that can get a lot of kills in bots games when i can't win in normals lol. I've tried most of the champs that don't have mana, like akali, aatrox and riven, but I've been the most successful with Jayce so far. so yeah idk, it's just a goal i guess.
Guinness book of Records; most kills in a bot game under 20 min.
